document.full_text: south sudan's army said it fought heavy battles with militia in the oil-producing unity state on thursday, the latest clashes in an upsurge of violence in the region soon to become the world's newest nation.
document.title: south sudan army clash with heavily armed militia
lines_and_colors: south sudan's army said it fought heavy battles with militia in the oil-producing unity state on thursday, the latest clashes in an upsurge of violence in the region soon to become the world's newest nation.
